item.title: Chinese stocks slide as Trump threatens tariffs, accuses Beijing of holding world ‘captive’
item.description: The selloff underscored renewed investor anxiety over escalating U.S.-China tensions.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: MP Materials, Alibaba, Protagonist Therapeutics & more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves midday.

item.title: Why Wall Street's old 'wall of worry' and new 'debasement trade' are boosting gold, bitcoin in typically volatile October
item.description: Gold and bitcoin hit record highs as investors hedge against inflation, surging U.S. debt, and a weakening dollar in the new "debasement trade."

item.title: Fed Governor Waller sees more rate cuts but says central bank needs to be 'cautious about it'
item.description: Waller continues to support lowering rates but said the central bank needs to be careful amid conflicting economic signals.

item.title: Morgan Stanley drops restrictions on which wealth clients can own crypto funds
item.description: Morgan Stanley's move marks the latest expansion of access to crypto at the world's largest wealth management firm.
